markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Harmonic Hauberk](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1380)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Focused" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=74" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 84</row>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Rose gold and copper rings in this _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [chain shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)_ form a vague bird shape. The jingling links tinkle musically, almost like birdsong. While you wear the armor, effects with the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait must first [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the _harmonic hauberk_ or they have no effect on you.

 The _harmonic hauberk_ attempts to counteract [_silence_](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) spells cast on you and 4th-level or higher heightened _silence_ spells the first time the armor enters their area (counteract level 4, counteract modifier +20). After failing to counteract a _silence_ spell, the armor can't attempt to counteract the same spell again, even if you leave and enter the spell's area multiple times.

<document level="2" id="action-1065" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Harmonic Hauberk

text: <title level="1" right="Item 13" pfs="Standard" > Harmonic Hauberk Source Grand Bazaar pg. 84 Price 2,500 gp Usage worn armor Bulk 1 Base Armor Chain Shirt --- Rose gold and copper rings in this +2 resilient chain shirt form a vague bird shape. The jingling links tinkle musically, almost like birdsong. While you wear the armor, effects with the auditory trait must first counteract the harmonic hauberk or they have no effect on you. The harmonic hauberk attempts to counteract silence spells cast on you and 4th-level or higher heightened silence spells the first time the armor enters their area (counteract level 4, counteract modifier +20). After failing to counteract a silence spell, the armor can't attempt to counteract the same spell again, even if you leave and enter the spell's area multiple times.
